blog

i deleted all my social media in december of 2023 because it was killing my brain and making me hate myself. before i deleted my socials i started blogging because i have always been fascinated with the original web 2 infrastructure and the concept of un conglomerated sharing. i have continued that process and i make posts which you can read / watch / look at here.

  • 08 May 2021 : i sat under a tree and watched youtube videos about apple inc while thinking about self promotion

  • 06 May 2021 : letting go seems impossible and this is not news

  • 06 May 2021 : making a website i guess

this is not the full list of all of my posts. it is kinda taxing to convert them all from my previous website to my new one because i switched from writing my whole website in static html to building my site with jekyll at the suggestion of my awesome friend jacob!

in the mean time you can see my old old posts (formally called biproducts) by visiting this archive site i created to memorialize the work i did on my first site.
